name: jQuery.isWindow
title: jQuery.isWindow()
desc: Determine whether the argument is a window.

argument.desc: Object to test whether or not it is a window.
argument.name: obj

examples.desc: Finds out if the parameter is a window.

entries.longdesc: This is used in a number of places in jQuery to determine if we're operating against a browser window (such as the current window or an iframe).
